content: assistant: Hello! Curricular Practical Training (CPT) is a type of off-campus work authorization specifically for international students who are enrolled in F-1 status. It allows you to gain practical experience related to your field of study while you're attending school in the United States. CPT is usually tied to specific courses or programs offered by your institution, and it's typically part of your academic curriculum. If you have more questions about CPT or need help with the process, feel free to ask!
I'm glad to help! If you have more questions about OPT, STEM OPT, or any other F-1 visa matters, feel free to ask. Good luck with your journey!
